reviewText: The only reason for the 2 stars is due to WB disc rot on Happy feet & Scooby Dao, otherwise the movies are stunning on the format if... well you happen to get a non rotted copy

All the movies in the pack just work and that's a big deal with HD DVD movies. I recommend this pack for the kids and family. All discs are good quality in audio and viewing so far so good. I have acquired it for a terrific low price so that I'm so happy with this purchase!!!

I 've recieved my order in a timely matter and my purchased product was in a excellent condition. Thank you for that, Your company has done a great job. I will order from your company more through amazon.com
